headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SALOMON, BARBARA JOAN

snippet: SALOMON--Barbara Joan. Barbara died on April 24, 2016 in Glen Cove. She is survived by her sons Douglas and Alan, her sister and brother-in-law Claire and Cliff, their children Ronni and Andrew, and their children, Sophie and Joshua. She was predeceased by her loving husband Burton. Services will held at 10am on Wednesday, April 27th at Gutterman's in Woodbury. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SALOMON--Barbara Joan. Barbara died on April 24, 2016 in Glen Cove. She is survived by her sons Douglas and Alan, her sister and brother-in-law Claire and Cliff, their children Ronni and Andrew, and their children, Sophie and Joshua. She was predeceased by her loving husband Burton. Services will held at 10am on Wednesday, April 27th at Gutterman's in Woodbury. 1/3
